Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ ]selet n~te P,#c#: ]a~gia m~m/i Dumian/: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O bride of Christ, Saint Demiana, that He may forgive us our sins.
